name: bridal-party-website
description: Bridal party website with SCSS styling

scripts.scss:build: sass --no-source-map public/scss/main.scss public/css/styles.css && sass --no-source-map public/scss/auth.scss public/css/auth.css
scripts.scss:prod: sass --style=compressed --no-source-map public/scss/main.scss public/css/styles.css && sass --style=compressed --no-source-map public/scss/auth.scss public/css/auth.css
